ygData.subject: Re: Everyone check this out
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I did some research on EQ Lizer and EQitem and neither list this item.  I got the bands of Tunare item that I asked about recently (that no one responded
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I did some research on EQ'Lizer and EQitem and neither list this
item. I got the "bands of Tunare" item that I asked about recently
(that no one responded to) on gamestats, so I suspect they don't
exist. This item is probably fake as well. Why anyone would go
through the trouble of faking an item is beyond me.
It's probably a fake, or intended as a joke of some kind. But I think
that sometimes what one finds off gamestats needs to be taken with a
grain of salt. Especially since they don't keep their equipment/
weapons sections as updated as some of the other sites.



>>From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>
>>
>>On another Cleric list this URL was listed and if this is true then Verant
>>are idiots.
>>http://everquest.gamestats.com/equipment/graphics5/Deepwater_Harpoon.htm
>>This weapon is for clerics and it's a slashing weapon.
>>
>>**************************
>>Azor Spellbound
>>Lvl 20 Human Cleric of the Rathe
>>**************************
>
>
